metadata.source: IUK transport milestones.pdf, Milestone long list 26_27.xlsx

impact_priorities.name: Transport and associated infrastructure emits less greenhouse gas
impact_priorities.description: The UK transport sector has been the largest emitter of greenhouse gases since 2016. Focus on reducing emissions across all sectors with specific goals for phase-out of diesel HGVs and decarbonisation of airports. Planned activities address future fuel aggregation and developing concepts for better future fuel operations and infrastructure.

impact_priorities.name: Public transport, shared transport and transport infrastructure is more efficient, inclusive and safe
impact_priorities.description: Efficient, inclusive, and safe transport systems ensure everyone can access jobs, education, healthcare, employment, and social opportunities. Focus on railway stations and airports as key interchanges, understanding how modes integrate with buses, trams, metros, micro-mobility, and active travel.

milestones.activity: Rail - Station Innovation Zone - Passenger and people experience
milestones.rationale: Enhancing the efficiency, safety, and inclusivity of transport hubs through innovation zone approach
milestones.embedding_text: Rail Station Innovation Zone Passenger people experience. Network Rail partnership. Enhancing efficiency safety inclusivity of transport hubs. Innovation zone approach for rail stations. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.activity: Rail - Station Innovation Zone - Bristol Temple Meads
milestones.rationale: Flagship innovation zone at major interchange station
milestones.embedding_text: Rail Station Innovation Zone Bristol Temple Meads. Network Rail GWR partnership. Flagship innovation zone major interchange station. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.rationale: Developing digital twin for energy efficiency at stations
milestones.embedding_text: Rail Energy Innovation Zone. Digital twin for energy efficiency at stations. Network Rail partnership. Decarbonisation focus. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.activity: Rail - CReDO rail use case development
milestones.rationale: Co-funding with DD BU and transport BU to expand CReDO to rail use case. NR relationship management to provide rail asset data for modelling.
milestones.customer_status: Network Rail, GBR(x) as future customer
milestones.is_alignment: Digital and data, Smart Data in transport
milestones.embedding_text: Rail CReDO rail use case development. Climate resilience infrastructure interdependency modelling. Network Rail GBR(x) partnership. Co-funding DD BU transport BU. Rail asset data integration. Digital and data alignment. Business growth score 3. 26/27 milestone.

milestones.rationale: Supporting inclusive aviation through neurodiversity research and co-design
milestones.embedding_text: Aviation Neurodiversity and inclusion. CALL Glasgow Airport partnership. Inclusive aviation through neurodiversity research co-design. Passenger experience focus. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.rationale: Demonstrating zero emission ground support equipment at airports
milestones.embedding_text: Aviation Ground support equipment demonstrator. Zero emission ground support equipment airports. Airport operations decarbonisation. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.rationale: Engage with public to understand perceptions and opinions of hydrogen aviation, produce recommendations to increase public knowledge
milestones.embedding_text: Aviation Hydrogen public engagement. Public perceptions opinions hydrogen aviation. Recommendations to increase public knowledge. DfT partnership. 25/26 milestone. Validation stage.

milestones.rationale: Understanding full operational context for hydrogen aviation
milestones.embedding_text: Aviation Hydrogen end-to-end operation context. Full operational context hydrogen aviation. Infrastructure operations integration. DfT airlines partnership. 26/27 milestone. Validation stage.

milestones.rationale: Feasibility study on domestic short sea shipping using alternative coastal routes to access rail/road network at areas of greater capacity
milestones.embedding_text: Maritime Coastal shipping corridors. Domestic short sea shipping alternative coastal routes. Modal shift road rail to coastal shipping. DfT port authorities partnership. 25/26 milestone. Validation stage.

milestones.rationale: Produce playbook on how UK might develop partnerships across supply chain for Green Shipping Corridors serving UK
milestones.embedding_text: Maritime Green shipping corridors. Playbook for UK partnerships supply chain Green Shipping Corridors. Green Shipping Corridor Accelerator. DfT Maritime UK partnership. 25/26 26/27 milestone. Development stage. Assessment Increase.

milestones.rationale: Analyse future transport fuel demand for maritime using specific location, develop plan to enable trials of transitional and future fuels
milestones.embedding_text: Maritime Future Fuels demand aggregation. Analyse transport fuel demand maritime. Plan for trials transitional future fuels. Port-specific analysis. DfT port authorities partnership. 25/26 milestone. Validation stage.

milestones.rationale: Accelerator programme for maritime innovation SMEs
milestones.embedding_text: Maritime Transport accelerator Maritime. Accelerator programme maritime innovation SMEs. SME growth investor engagement. Business growth score 3. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.activity: Maritime - Geofencing critical maritime infrastructure (sea and subsea)
milestones.rationale: Develop geofencing around critical maritime infrastructure to monitor suspicious vessels. AI/ML for assessment of suspicious movement. Alert system for attack risk identification. MOD dual-use potential.
milestones.embedding_text: Maritime Geofencing critical maritime infrastructure sea subsea. Monitor suspicious vessels AI ML assessment. Alert system attack risk identification. MOD partnership defence alignment. IS-8 Defence sector. Business growth score 3. 26/27 milestone. Development stage.

milestones.activity: Integrated Transport - Digital disabled user pass
milestones.rationale: Capturing digital disabled user moving through transport system with digital pass for user requirements at each journey leg and interchange
milestones.is_alignment: Digital and data, Smart Data in transport
milestones.embedding_text: Highways Integrated Transport Digital disabled user pass. Digital pass capturing user requirements each journey leg interchange. Transport service providers partnership. Digital data Smart Data alignment. Business growth score 3. 26/27 milestone. Validation stage.

milestones.rationale: EV uptake projected to decrease fuel duty 4.4%, Vehicle Excise Duty 7.1%, resulting in £2.1bn less revenue in 2026-27. Rising congestion, ageing infrastructure, unmet safety objectives necessitate re-examining road pricing strategy.
milestones.embedding_text: Highways Road user pricing. EV uptake decreasing fuel duty Vehicle Excise Duty £2.1bn revenue shortfall 2026-27. Rising congestion ageing infrastructure. Re-examining road pricing strategy. DfT Treasury stakeholders. 26/27 milestone. Validation stage. Assessment Re-assess.

milestones.activity: Highways - Zero Harm - Using Technology to deliver solutions
milestones.rationale: Local/combined/transport authorities have lower KSI or zero harm targets. Technology solutions available on market. Explore what is possible, create technical report on benefits, value for money, reducing KSIs.
milestones.embedding_text: Highways Zero Harm Using Technology deliver solutions. Technology to reduce killed seriously injured KSI. Local combined transport authorities zero harm targets. Technical report benefits value for money. 26/27 milestone. Validation stage.
